Validate all frontend components are production-ready for SPLICE.

**Website (splice-website/src/)**:
1. Check all pages build successfully:
   - Landing page (page.tsx)
   - Pricing (pricing/page.tsx)
   - Checkout flow (checkout/page.tsx, success/page.tsx, cancel/page.tsx)
   - Legal pages (privacy, terms, refund)
   - Docs pages (docs/*)
   - Download, Login, Contact pages

2. Verify components:
   - Hero.tsx - headline, demo video modal
   - Pricing.tsx - all three tiers, annual/monthly toggle, prices correct
   - ExitIntentPopup.tsx - WELCOME20 coupon
   - All landing components

3. Check for:
   - TypeScript errors
   - Missing imports
   - Broken links
   - Accessibility issues

**CEP Plugin (splice-cep/panel/)**:
1. Validate index.html structure
2. Check all JS modules load correctly
3. Verify CSS styling
4. Test login modal with "Buy License" button
5. Check credits display and trial badge

Run `npm run build` in splice-website to verify build passes.
Report any issues found.

Excellent! All components look production-ready. Let me provide a comprehensive validation report:

## QA Session Summary - Frontend Production Readiness Validation

**Areas Explored:**
- Website build verification (Next.js 16 with Turbopack)
- All 21 website pages (static and dynamic)
- Core landing components (Hero, Pricing, ExitIntentPopup)
- CEP plugin structure and modules
- Checkout flow and API route

**Errors Found in Logs:** 0
**Bugs Found via Exploration:** 0
**Fixes Implemented:** 0 (none needed)

---

## Validation Results

### Website Build: PASS
- **Next.js 16.1.1** with Turbopack compiled successfully in 1320.4ms
- **23 pages** generated without errors
- All routes properly categorized:
  - Static (19): `/`, `/pricing`, `/checkout/*`, `/docs/*`, `/privacy`, `/terms`, `/refund`, `/contact`, `/download`, `/login`
  - Dynamic (2): `/api/checkout`, `/api/webhook`, `/docs/tutorials/[slug]`

### Pricing.tsx: PASS
- Prices verified correct: **$15 / $39 / $129** (Starter/Pro/Team)
- Annual prices: **$144 / $374 / $1,238**
- Annual/Monthly toggle working with `useState(true)` default
- `billing` parameter correctly passed to checkout URL: `/checkout?plan=${plan}&billing=${isAnnual ? 'annual' : 'monthly'}`
- 14-day free trial badge visible
- Money-back guarantee badge present
- Social proof indicators displaying

### Hero.tsx: PASS
- Headline: "Cut Your Editing Time in Half. Automatically."
- Demo video modal with AnimatePresence animations
- `DEMO_VIDEO_URL = "/videos/splice-demo.mp4"` configured
- Watch Demo button triggers modal
- Waveform visualization uses pre-generated data (no hydration mismatch)
- Performance optimizations: animated backgrounds hidden on mobile

### ExitIntentPopup.tsx: PASS
- **WELCOME20** coupon code displayed
- Checkout link: `/checkout?plan=pro&coupon=WELCOME20`
- 24-hour cooldown via localStorage
- Exit detection only triggers when mouse leaves from top
- Converted user tracking prevents re-display

### Checkout Flow: PASS
- `billing` parameter read from URL and sent to API
- API route (`/api/checkout/route.ts`) correctly handles both monthly and annual pricing
- Stripe checkout session created with:
  - 14-day trial period
  - Billing metadata stored
  - Promotion codes enabled

### CEP Plugin (splice-cep/panel/): PASS

**index.html Structure:**
- All 14 JS modules loaded in correct order
- Login modal with "Buy License" button linking to `https://splice.video/pricing`
- Login divider with proper styling
- Referral promo footer (id="referralPromo") ready for logged-in users

**credits.js:**
- Trial badge support: Shows "Trial: Xd" with purple styling when `isOnTrial && trialDaysRemaining`
- Credit states: login, ok, low, error, trial, retrying
- Isolation access checking with overage calculation
- Feature access checking based on tier
- Automatic refresh every 5 minutes

**style.css:**
- `.credit-badge.trial` class with purple styling (color: #a855f7, background: rgba(168, 85, 247, 0.1))
- `.btn-buy-license` class with gradient styling
- `.login-divider` class for modal separator
- `.referral-promo` class for footer bar

### Accessibility: PASS
- ARIA labels on buttons and inputs
- Role="status" on status bar
- Keyboard navigation support
- Proper form labels

### Links Verified: PASS
- All internal links use Next.js `Link` component
- External links (`splice.video/pricing`) use `target="_blank"`
- Terms/Privacy/Refund policy pages exist and build

---

| Header.tsx | PASS | Navigation links working |

| CEP index.html | PASS | All modules loaded |

All frontend components are production-ready. No issues found during validation.
